Text: Thanksgiving Special from AirTran AirwaysHere are some last minute fares to get you to where you want to go this Thanksgiving Fares must be purchased at least day prior to departure and are valid for travel on November Fares must be purchased by November Purchase these fares at wwwairtrancom and save an additional each way Below you will find some sample sale fares Travel may originate in either city and all fares are oneway and dont require a roundtrip purchase Atlanta Boston Atlanta Fort Lauderdale Atlanta Orlando Atlanta Tallahassee Chicago Midway New Orleans DallasFort Worth New York LaGuardia Dayton Myrtle Beach Memphis BuffaloNiagara Newark Miami Philadelphia Pensacola Pittsburgh Houston Hobby Tampa Miami Tampa Tallahassee Remember Travel on the above fares may originate in either city and all fares are oneway and dont require roundtrip purchase And dont forget to purchase your Thanksgiving sale fares at wwwairtrancom where you will receive a BONUS discount each way Other rules and restrictions All fares are oneway All fares are nonrefundable and a per person fee applies to any change made after purchase plus any applicable increase in airfare Fares must be purchased at least day prior to departure and are valid for travel on November Fares must be purchased by November Seats are limited and subject to availability Fares dont include segment taxes of per segment A segment is defined as a takeoff and landing Airport passenger facility charges of up to are not included As a subscriber to AirTran Airways Net Escapes we send you regular updates on our Internet specials If you need to contact us for any other reason please call us at AIRTRAN or in Atlanta call Please note that any reference to Net Escapes fares Feature City fares or bonus discounts for booking online may ONLY be purchased on our web site Please click UMUaspB and you will be removed immediately Or To unsubscribe mailto or if the emailaddress is not clickable simply copy the text to the right of the mailto command and paste it into your email application and hit send You will be taken off the list immediately Thank you
